resources.string: Opps! Something went wrong, please try again.
Problem connecting to server, Please try later.
Unable to connect to the service, please try again later.
No Internet connection. Please check your network settings.
There are no photos or videos as of now.

Welcome to SF Tournament Page. We are super excited to have you here.\nYou can click on "Find Tournaments" button below to view events happening near you area.\nYou can "Create Tournaments" by clicking on Switch To Tournament Organizer Mode button.

Select which players you want for this match.SF will check with them and let you know.You can make your final lineup from available players once they have responded.
 Note:
1. Permanent players need to be added via Player Management.
 2. Being "Available" does not mean player is in final lineup till you make the final lineup.

Matches
Match is team’s public event with participation limited to only its players. Captain needs to lineup his players and can give them specific tasks. Other members of SF universe can follow this event. Team’s match is visible to all.

Practice
Team’s practice is limited to team’s roster (team members). Organizer / captain may decide to not invite a team member before sending invites but no person external to team’s roster can be invited. However, even an uninvited team member will be able to view the event since he is part of the team.

MeetUp
A meetup is team’s internal event. All team members are invited by default. However, organizer can deselect invitees before saving the event. Since it’s a team’s internal event, rest of the SF community cannot view or follow this event. But an organizer can invite a non team member by sending specific invites irrespective of whether he /she has a relevant sports Avatar.. In such a case, the event is visible to that specific non team member also.

Event
Team’s public event involves each and everyone in the SF universe. SF members can decide to either attend or just follow updates of this event. This event allows organizer to invite anyone irrespective of whether SF member has a relevant sports avatar. As per the name, these events are visible to all on Teams general profile page, calendar and other public forums. All team members are of course invited by default but organizer can remove specific team members before sending invites.
This user is already in team roster, you can add this user from existing players list.
PLEASE SELECT RUN SCORED ON LEGBYE.
PLEASE SELECT RUN SCORED ON BYE.
You can not start inning... please ask other team scorer to login and start inning
